summary: Get SKU list and stock by warehouse code
description: Get SKU list and stock by warehouse code

query.name: fulfilment_sku
query.description: List of shop SKU, Comma separated list in square brackets

common.name: app_key
common.description: Unique app ID issued by LAZADA Open Platform console when you apply for an app category

common.name: timestamp
common.description: The time stamp of the request e.g. 1517820392000 (which translates to 5 February 2018 08:46:32) with less than 7200s difference from UTC time

common.name: sign_method
common.description: The HMAC hash algorithm you are using to calculate your signature

request_examples.code:
client = LazopApiClient::Client.new(url, appkey, appSecret)
request = LazopApiClient::Request.new('/fbl/stocks/get','GET')
request.add_api_parameter("seller_sku", "AP082ELAAXCXJVANID")
request.add_api_parameter("marketplace", "LAZADA_ID")
request.add_api_parameter("fulfilment_sku", "AP082ELAAXCXJVANID-75574360,WA362HBABISOANID-77873")
request.add_api_parameter("store_code", "OMS-LAZADA-SG-W-1")
response = client.execute(request, accessToken)
puts response.success?
puts response.body

client = lazop.LazopClient(url, appkey ,appSecret)
request = lazop.LazopRequest('/fbl/stocks/get','GET')
request.add_api_param('seller_sku', 'AP082ELAAXCXJVANID')
request.add_api_param('marketplace', 'LAZADA_ID')
request.add_api_param('fulfilment_sku', 'AP082ELAAXCXJVANID-75574360,WA362HBABISOANID-77873')
request.add_api_param('store_code', 'OMS-LAZADA-SG-W-1')
response = client.execute(request, access_token)
print(response.type)
print(response.body)
